mapper.insert: insert into qna (userid, parentno, subject, content, hit, regtime) values (#{userid}, #{parentno}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select:
WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT qnano, parentno, link, lv, userid, subject, content, hit, regtime, ancientno FROM (select qnano, parentno, cast(qnano as char(100)) as link, 0 as lv,
userid, subject, content, hit, case when date_format(regtime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(regtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(regtime, '%y.%m.%d') end regtime, qnano as ancientno from qna where parentno is null order by qnano desc ) as c
UNION ALL
SELECT a.qnano, a.parentno, concat(link, ",", cast(a.qnano as char(100))), lv + 1,
a.userid, concat(REPEAT("RE : ", lv+1), a.subject), a.content, a.hit, case when date_format(a.regtime, '%Y%m%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') then date_format(a.regtime, '%H:%i:%s') else date_format(a.regtime, '%y.%m.%d') end, ancientno
FROM qna a JOIN CTE b ON a.parentno = b.qnano ) SELECT qnano, parentno, link, lv, userid, subject, content, hit, regtime, ancientno FROM CTE
where subject like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
where ${key} = #{word}
order by ancientno desc, link, parentno limit #{start}, #{spp}
